<g:plusone size="medium"></g:plusone>

Tweet anything from Firefox context menu.

<wiki:toc max_depth="2"/>

= Compatibility =

 * Firefox 4.0 - 6.0a2

= Installation =
 * [https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/tweet-context/ Mozilla Add-ons]
 * [http://loucypher.googlecode.com/svn/TweetContext/xpi/ dev builds]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/loucypher/source/browse/#svn%2FTweetContext%2Ftrunk browse the source]

= Features =

== Context menus ==

 * Main context menu
  * on web page
  * on a link
  * on a frame/iframe
  * on an image

 * Tab context menu

 * Bookmark context menu

== Echofon integration ==

You can choose between default Twitter [https://twitter.com/intent/tweet tweet page] or use [http://www.echofon.com/ Echofon] to tweet.
